name: Ghoul-Busters
description:
Enjoy this retro remake inspired by the 1984 Commodore 64 release Ghostbusters. In this unique reimagining, manage staff and take calls as ghosts over-run your city. Purchase and upgrade your gear to aid you in capturing ghosts, making money and working to prevent the end of the world.  

Manage Your Business:

  • Hire Staff.
  • Upgrade / buy new gear.
  • Manage your cashflow.

Capture Ghosts:

  • Test your skills hunting ghosts
  • You will need to be quick and hire the right team
  • Improving your gear will help

Final Battle Shooter:

  • During end battle game becomes a FPS 
  • Make your way to the roof, fighting ghosts and monsters along the way.
  • Be sure to have upgraded your gear, or the mission will be impossible.

 Early Access....

This game is early access, the game is playable but there is more features planed such as firing staff, refilling staff energy, a save/load feature and more FPS elements. 

This is my absolute first project (outside of mods) that I've ever created and was started via Unity's creating with code course... so constructive feedback is always welcome :)
